page.title: 05GOVERNMENT
page.content: This area has three levels of local government. They are: (a) Hampshire County Council (b) Winchester City Council (the district council) (c) Itchen Valley Parish Council. The villages of Easton,Itchen Abbas,Avington make up the {Parish {Council of Itchen Valley.}The maojority of our block comes under this council. The north east corner comes under {Itchen Stoke and {Ovington.}These small councils deal with small matters such as footpaths,street-lighting,planning applications,village halls etc. They also act as pressure group giving their opinion on local issues to the County Council.
